messages.subject: CARL!  Re: Picture Books About Dogs
messages.msgSnippet: The Carl books are not the ones I was referring to...those books are by Alexandra Day.  The dog books we enjoy are by Lynley Dodd, an author from New Zealand.
messages.messageBody:
The Carl books are not the ones I was referring to...those books are
by Alexandra Day. The dog books we enjoy are by Lynley Dodd, an
author from New Zealand. Her books are so beautiful!

here is a link I just found with some photos of her covers:

http://pets-books.com/search_Lynley_Dodd/searchBy_Author.html

(I'm sure there are other better sites but that is the first one I
found with Google...)

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] CARL!  Re: Picture Books About Dogs
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hank, the Cow Dog? -pam National Home Education Network  Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999 through information,
messages.messageBody:
On Apr 25, 2004, at 10:59 AM, Holly Furgason wrote:

> Those have already been nixed. I'm doing this class for a training
> facility and don't have final say. Most of the books that I chose
> weren't what they wanted. That's why I turned to the most widely
> read group of children's literature experts I could think of- you
> guys.

Hank, the Cow Dog?

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.messageBody:
Those have already been nixed. I'm doing this class for a training
facility and don't have final say. Most of the books that I chose
weren't what they wanted. That's why I turned to the most widely
read group of children's literature experts I could think of- you
guys.

Holly
2 COOL 4 SCHOOL
Unschooling T-shirts
http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school

pictures to

order of Nana

The Carl Books! Glad you thought of these, I didn't. All pictures to
tell the story, no words. Carl is a Rottweiller, tempered on the order of Nana
in Peter Pan. JJ
